name: Alien Wars Gold
description: "Token is used as the main utility token in the Alien Wars game economy. AWG will be gained through staking of Alien Wars NFT and PvE/PvP gameplay on our Alien Wars Dapp. https://dapp.alienwars.io Utilities include: 1) Purchasing NFTs on the marketplace 2) Merging of NFTs, Alien War Gold will be needed for every NFT merging 3) Entrance fees for in-game faction wars 4) Future NFT mints 5) Promote Trooper NFT to Commanders NFT 6) PvE Missions sign up fee"
